about_the_game:
Smash into Bay City! The Block Buster demo features the entire first level. This includes objectives, rewards, collectibles and cosplay building. Get familiar with the game before making your purchase!

Devour humans, knock plains out of the air and demolish the city! Block Buster is dedicated to every monster movie you've ever seen. Don your rubber monster suit and set fire to the town. Collect costume pieces within the city to build and unlock new monsters. Roast humans on electric fences for a quick meal, pop their heads off and more!

Block Buster features a variety of levels, monsters and themes hailing from your favorite monster moments.
